page.title: 06VISIT TO HIGHTOWN OF CRAIGS
page.content: During the second part of our visit we were shown round by Mr. Telfer,one of Mr.McKeachie's workers.Mr.Telfer showed us the various buildings on the farm and also the machinery.There were three combine harvesters,all H registrations.Mr.Telfer also showed us the muck spreader,reaping machines and tractors.One of the tractors was a MUffield 60BMC Diesel which is used for drainage. Mr.Telfer then took us to our mini bus to go back to school.We said we had all had a lovely time and we went back stacked with lots of interesting information.
